name: Steven Bax
profileDescription: I work on products and long-running projects as a Front-end developer. Specialised in CSS development and architecture. I focus on implementing design while setting up a scalable, maintainable and good performing CSS architecture and workflow.
expertise: Javascript, React, HTML, a11y, SCSS, itcss/inuitcss
projects: Eneco, LeasePlan, FedEx, TNT, NEMO Science Museum, KRO, Budget Energie

name: Gert-Jan de Goede
profileDescription: Working as a User Experience and Visual Designer. Mainly for digital platforms and products. Big fan of scrum methodology. Started years ago in branding & identity and now translating and presenting those brands in an online environment.
expertise: UX & UI design, Branding & Identity, Sketch, Scrum
projects: LeasePlan, FedEx, TNT, Allerhande, ING, Ultimaker, Liander, Sunweb
